body:
Hey @juuh42dias looking at your screenshot I just realized you're using a native dropdown element _(looks a bit bootstrappy on Linux on first sight)_

However, in Chrome on Mac, this would end up looking like this:
![screen shot 2017-08-13 at 17 19 53](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/3491815/29250976-a39ca29e-804c-11e7-928a-283125c02a4e.png)


The Bootstrap - and probably preferred way - would be this:
![screen shot 2017-08-13 at 17 25 51](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/3491815/29250980-bc94ecca-804c-11e7-9b07-120fe27f6810.png)

The changes for this would just be:
```ruby
= select_tag 'past_teams', options_for_select(Season.all_years), prompt: 'Past Teams', class: 'form-control'
```

However, since you'r not adding a form on this page, I think the element you're looking for is actually [a button with a dropdown](https://getbootstrap.com/docs/4.0/components/dropdowns/).
